Desc.entry: A 4 acre walled garden in Wortley with organic certification by the Soil Association. Restored and managed by Heeley City Farm. Grows quality organic fruit and vegetables which are sold to local restaurants and shops to raise funds for Heeley City Farm Trust. Runs regular volunteer days and workshops and hosts open day events.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues & Thurs 10.30am-4pm (volunteer sessions - volunteers can access free transport to the garden which departs from Heeley City Farm at 9.30am)
